verses.text: Unto thee, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, do we give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w*, \add unto thee\add* do we give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w*: for \add that\add* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* is \w near|strong="H7138"\w* thy wondrous \w works|strong="H6381"\w* \w declare|strong="H5608"\w*.\f + \fr 75.1 \ft Al-taschith: or, Destroy not\f*\f + \fr 75.1 \ft of: or, for\f*
When I shall \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* I will \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w uprightly|strong="H4339"\w*.\f + \fr 75.2 \ft receiveâ€¦: or, take a set time\f*

The \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* and all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof are \w dissolved|strong="H4127"\w*: I bear \w up|strong="H8505"\w* the \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* of it. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w fools|strong="H1984"\w*, Deal not \w foolishly|strong="H1984"\w*: and to the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, Lift not \w up|strong="H7311"\w* the \w horn|strong="H7161"\w*:
Lift not \w up|strong="H7311"\w* your \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* on \w high|strong="H4791"\w*: \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \add not with\add* a \w stiff|strong="H6277"\w* \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*.

For \w promotion|strong="H7311"\w* \add cometh\add* neither from the \w east|strong="H4161"\w*, nor from the \w west|strong="H4628"\w*, nor from the \w south|strong="H4057"\w*.\f + \fr 75.6 \ft south: Heb. desert\f*
But \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* the \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*: he putteth \w down|strong="H8213"\w* one, and setteth \w up|strong="H7311"\w* another.

For in the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add there is\add* a \w cup|strong="H3563"\w*, and the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* is \w red|strong="H2560"\w*; it is \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w mixture|strong="H4538"\w*; and he poureth \w out|strong="H5064"\w* of the \w same|strong="H2088"\w*: but the \w dregs|strong="H8105"\w* thereof, all the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall wring \add them\add* \w out|strong="H4680"\w*, \add and\add* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \add them\add*.
But I will \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*; I will sing \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* to the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

All the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* also will I cut \w off|strong="H1438"\w*; \add but\add* the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall be \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*.
